name: Fractal Explorer (Reduxen)
description:
Basic Controls:

Left Mouse to rotate Fractal. Scroll Wheel to Zoom.

Tab toggles the Menu. For those beautiful Screenshots!

Free Cam:

Free Cam stops the Fractal from rotating automatically!

Hold down Right Mouse to use Free Cam and   look around with your Mouse.

While holding Right Mouse use W/A/S/D to Move and Q/E to move up and down.

Use Scroll Wheel while holding down Right Mouse to change your movement Speed (Or use the Slider in the top right)

Play in Fullscreen & Standalone  for best experience and performance!
